summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department authorizing an Easement to Puget Sound Power and Light (PSP&L), for an electrical line to provide power to the Water Department's motor operated valves located at the west end of Lake Youngs Supply Lines No. 4 & 5, (LYSL \#4 & 5) within Lake Youngs Reservation in Section 1, Township 22 North, Range 5 East, W.M., King County, Washington.
